channel.title: Builder Pattern on Adam Coding Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Builder Pattern on Adam Coding Corner

item.title: Kotlin Builder Pattern
item.description: The Builder Design Pattern is one of most popular and useful construction patterns in software engineering. In this post I will try to explain it and show how you can use it with Kotlin. Sadly I often see implementations that are simple translation from Java rather that utilizing cool Kotlin syntactic sugar.
